mapper.select: select video.id,video.video_name,video.video_location,video.picture, video.intro,video.user_name,video_type.type_name,video_label.label_name FROM video,video_type,video_label where video.type_id = video_type.id and video_label.label_id= video.label_id and video_type.type_name=#{videoType}

select video.id,video.video_name,video.video_location,video.picture, video.intro,video.user_name,video_type.type_name,video_label.label_name FROM video,video_type,video_label where video.type_id = video_type.id and video_label.label_id= video.label_id and label_name=#{videoLabel}

select video.id,video.video_name,video.video_location,video.picture, video.intro,video.user_name,video_type.type_name,video_label.label_name FROM video,video_type,video_label where video.type_id = video_type.id and video_label.label_id= video.label_id and video_name = #{videoName}
